data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_0
data.text: After dark descends over the castle of stokes, a small door in the wall opens and two furtive figures steal out...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_1
data.text:
BUT AS THEY VANISH INTO THE
                KIGHT, ONOTHER FORM RISES FROM THE SHADOWS
                AND FOLLOWS ...IT IS ROBIN HOOD...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_2
data.text: THROUGH THE DARK THE CLOAKED FIGURES SNEAK TO THE SHEER CLIFFS LEADING TO THE SEA FAR BELOW...A QUICK CHALLENGE FROM A GUARD WHO LOOMS SUDDENLY INTO VIEW IS ANSWERED...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_3
data.text: THE GUARD DISAPPEARS AS MYSTERIOUSLY AS HE CAME AND THE TWO FIGURES VANISH NEAR THE BRINK OF THE STEEP CLIFF...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_5
data.text: BY MY HILT, DO GHOSTS DWELL ALONG THE SEA ? SHADOWS COME AND GO AS IF FROM NOWHERE AND INTO...WHERE ?

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_6
data.text:
THEN SILENTLY AS THE NIGHT
                ITSELF, HE CRAWLS FORWARD TO THE EDGE OF THE BLUFF...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_7
data.text: THERE HE FINDS NARROW STEPS CUT INTO THE WALL- LIKE FACE OF ROCK...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_020_8
data.text:
NOT A SOUND BETRAYS HIM TO THE UNSEEN GUARD ABOVE AS HE
                GLIDES DOWN THOSE HIDDEN STAIRS... 4
